thread.title: US man disembowels girlfriend after she screams ex’s name during sex
thread.title_full: US man disembowels girlfriend after she screams ex’s name during sex | News24

author: news24.com
title: US man disembowels girlfriend after she screams ex’s name during sex
text:
Sunrise - Authorities say a Florida man who called 911 to say his girlfriend was having trouble breathing later admitted killing her.
Sunrise police told local news media that 24-year-old Fidel Lopez called 911 early on Sunday.
Officers responding to the apartment said they found Lopez crying in the bathroom next to 31-year-old Maria Nemeth's naked body.
Police say Lopez initially told investigators that the couple had been having sex when Nemeth went into the bathroom, vomited and collapsed.
After further questioning, Lopez revealed that he became enraged with Nemeth when she called out her ex-husband's name during sex and he attacked and disemboweled her.
Florida Man in Custody After Reportedly Killing Girlfriend by Ripping Out Her Bowels http://t.co/SCLDCIYoyq pic.twitter.com/amqeHXKQR5
